jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer Corporate IT
jobs_results.description:
Position

In a challenging and multicultural environment, Software Engineer, accordingly with their specialization, maintains existing systems and build new solutions addressing the needs of all divisions of the bank.

This is an exciting opportunity for a talented team-player to join a technology team that is responsible of a portfolio of solutions for various business lines of the bank (Risk, Finance, Compliance, Market Risk, Trade Finance, Operations …) and which is constantly growing his technical expertise for building a wide range of modern and reliable solutions.

Main responsibilities
• Understand business & nonfunctional requirements
• Understand solution architecture and integration challenges
• Develop solutions based on requirements and propose relevant optimization
• Maintain a high standard of delivery in term of quality and velocity
• Elaborate project documentations (design documents, deployment guide …)
• Blend in your team and collaborate effectively with other... members
• Contribute to reporting in place

Continuous Improvement

Proactively propose improvement of our processes (efficiency, reliability)
Establishment new know how supporting performance of your team on any aspect

jobs_results.title: Software Developer
jobs_results.description:
Interested applicants, please email your resume to us at career@biztech-i.com.

Software Developer ( 2 positions)

You will assist in the development of front-end, database and interactive applications for our clients.

Position 1
• Degree in Computer Science/Information Systems; with a minimum of 2 - 3 years' working experience
• Experience in client-server applications development using VB script, XML / XSL, HTML, Keyflow and preferably with knowledge on SQL, Oracle and VB6.0
• Possesses MCP or MCSE certification

Position 2
• Degree in Computer Science/Information Systems; with a minimum of 2 - 3 years' working experience
• Experience in database applications development using SQL, Oracle and VB6.0, Oracle XML SQL, VBA and Keyflow
• Possesses MCP or MCSE certification

jobs_results.title: PEGA Developer - Architect (Analyst - Manager)
jobs_results.description:
About Accenture

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services—all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centres. Our 506,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.

Accenture is an Irish-domiciled multinational professional services company that provides services in:
• Technology
• Strategy & Consulting
• Interactive
• Operations

As a Fortune Global 500 company, it has been incorporated in Dublin, Ireland since September 1, 2009. In 2019, the company reported revenues... of $43.2 billion, with more than 492,000 employees serving clients in more than 200 cities in 120 countries.

Accenture Technology combines business and industry insights with innovative technology services to transform your business. Join one of the world’s largest independent providers of technology services to grow your expertise and help clients worldwide to innovate at scale and transform their businesses. Help change how the world works and lives through technology innovation.

Job Title: PEGA Application Developer - Architect (Analyst - Manager)

Critical Success Factors:

Mandatory
• Depending on seniority, around 1-10 years in System Integrator (SI) environment (in an implementation/a development capacity, rather than sales/maintenance)
• At least 1-5 years of hands-on experience in development / architecture
• We will consider Java Developers at (Analyst - Consultant level) who are keen to make a switch to pick up PEGA

Preferred/Optional
• Experience in PEGA Rule Process Commander (PRPC)n / Care Management Framework (PEGA)
• Experience in PEGA technical and architecture with broad industry and functional knowledge
• 7.n PEGA Certification is preferred (PEGA Certified SA/SSA)

Key responsibilities may include:
• Collaborate with Project Team in understanding client requirements and how they translate in application features
• Collaborate with the Team to set specifications for new applications Perform troubleshooting and debugging of applications when required
• Evaluate existing applications to reprogram, update and add new features Work with business process owners/SMEs to assess capabilities and identify high-level user requirements
• Work with project managers, architects and SMEs to define metrics and performance goals for the process.
• Participate in transitioning the requirements and use cases.

You will also have opportunities to hone your functional skills and expertise in an area of specialization. We offer a variety of formal and informal training programs at every level to help you acquire and build specialized skills faster. Learning takes place both on the job and through formal training conducted online, in the classroom, or in collaboration with teammates. The sheer variety of work we do, and the experience it offers, provide an unbeatable platform from which to build a career.

Accenture is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all sections of society and does not discriminate on grounds of race, religion or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis as protected by applicable law

jobs_results.title: Agile Coach
jobs_results.description:
Qualifications & Experience
• Licences and Certifications/accreditations: Scrum Master and Product Owner certification other associations are must, Practitioner certification of Scaled Agile framework like LeSS, SaFE, Scrum@Scale, Spotify, Nexus and Human Centred Design or Design Thinking are plus.
• Desired Professional Memberships: Association or Discipline Association Membership well regarded.

Experience
• Minimum of 5 years hands on experience in Agile or other related disciplines (Lean Software Development, Human Centred Design).
• Minimum of 10-year experience in Information Technology
• Minimum of 2 years leading & managing Software/ IT Projects / Teams using Agile
• (Desired) Experience in leading transformation in non-technology functions
• (Desired) Experience in cultural transformation
• Proficient in using a variety of agile delivery tools e.g. JIRA, Confluence

If you are keen to explore further, please share your contact details to [Confidential... Information]

Regards

Neha

jobs_results.title: Solution Architect & Delivery Lead
jobs_results.description:
Position: Solution Architect cum Delivery Lead (Ref: BN)
Roles &

Responsibilities

Responsibilities:

Work with Product Owner(s) to translate business requirements to technical requirements, including establishing delivery timelines and deliverables. Draw up the technical architecture based on the user stories established from the business requirements. Propose technical solution from high level to details for system integration in the complicated application system. Manage day-to-day activities of the team/squad, including creating, prioritising and managing the backlogs of activities.

End-to-end project delivery experience in an agile manner. Assess, define, implement and support world-class Agile transformation programs. Manage and coach a team of tech developers

Requirements: A bachelor’s degree in a relevant computer science, engineering, information technology or related field. 10 years of delivery lead experience with hands-on experience in solution architecture, delivering... agile projects (planning, execution and team management) as well as managing a team of tech developers. Possess one or more of the following certifications: (1) Certified Scrum Professional, or (2) SAFe Program Consultant, Lean Methodologies

Able to solve complex development problems and produce the highest quality code while striving to push the technical boundaries of online applications.

Experience with web scripting languages such as PHP, Javascript, or Python. Familiar with AWS components and services, e.g. S3, API Gateway, Lambda Functions, etc. and knowledge in one or more programming languages (e.g., Python, Javascript, Swift). Extensive knowledge and experience with driving and applying user-centered design processes while working collaboratively with customers, along with cross-functional teams including engineering, product management and user research.

Possess a strong Agile delivery track record, and willing to contribute actively within the firm’s Agile community. Experienced in implementing Agile and Lean practices in the context of Software Engineering. Extensive work experience as Scrum Master, with in-depth knowledge of DevOps and strong background in agile tools (eg Jira). Excellent communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills. Excellent leadership and management skills.

If Interested, kindly email your updated CV in MS Word format to (Please contact us using the "Apply for this Job Posting" box below), along with below details :

jobs_results.title: Senior QA Test Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Activate Interactive is a fast-growing technology company with a 20-year track record history and still going strong with plans to grow more. We focus on mobile and web applications in the exciting space of digital health & more. We are already making waves with our technological solutions & initiatives that have impacted thousands of people and lives!

We have opportunities for you to grow your career path and are looking for talented professionals to join our team.

Responsibilities
• Design and implement conventional test i.e. System Integration and User Acceptance Test
• Design and implement functional and non-functional software validation test on iOS, Android and web platforms
• Design and implement static and dynamic security testing (SAST & DAST)
• Design and implement Performance Test
• Design and implement Test Case
• Design and maintain test environments
• Carry out test activities according to Test Plan
• Conduct Test Execution and prepare Test Reports
• Maintain... requirement traceability matrix
• Develop automation test scripts in Python language
• Support the integration of test script with the Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CICD) pipeline
• Drive product quality and Quality Assurance practices

Requirements
• Minimum 6 years experience in conventional test
• Minimum 3 years experience in automation testing scripting for web-portals and mobile applications
• Experience working in Agile Scrum projects
• Experience in developing automation testing scripts i.e. mobile (Appium) and web (Selenium)
• Knowledge and/or Experience in Test-Driven Development (TDD) i.e. Unit Testing
• Experience in Behaviour-Driven Development (BDD) Test
• Experience in Non-Functional Testing i.e. security and performance test
• Strong and effective interpersonal and communication skills, motivated, good attitude, responsible, proactive and an energetic team player will be a plus
• Systematic, meticulous and able to work independently

Preference
• Knowledge of Robot Framework (using Python language) will be advantageous
• Knowledge of Secure Hybrid Integration Pipeline (HATS) and Hive Agile Testing Solutions (SHIP) will be advantageous
• Knowledge in software version control systems, code review workflows and CICD will be advantageous

Qualifications And Skills
• Diploma/Bachlor's degree or higher in Electronics Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or related discipline
• A natural tenacity, resiliency and determination
• Certifications such as Certified Software Testing Professional, Certified Software Quality Analyst and/or CREST certification will be advantageous
• Passionate in learning and working with new technologies

Benefits
• Flexi benefits that covers medical, gym, sports and wellness

jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs_results.description: Metropolitan Wireless International Pte Ltd. Posted on 12-Mar-21 Senior Software Engineer Metropolitan Wireless International Pte Ltd. Job DescriptionResponsibilities Designing, developing and testing assigned modules – this will include module design and test documentation Code development and peer reviews Module testing and reporting Carrying out related QA activities, attending quality audits Installation and testing of application at site Carrying out user training Troubleshooting & maintenance of application. Requirements Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from a reputed Institute/University. Minimum 6 years of development work experience in Core Java multi-threaded client-server applications is mandatory (or) Oracle Java Certification with minimum 3-years’ experience. Minimum 3 Year(s) of working experience as Full Stack Developer Experience with backend framework such as Java (Spring Boot), NodeJs Experience in designing and developing APIs Working experience in the... following frameworks – Multi-thread applications using core Java - mandatory Hibernate for Database – desired Familiarity with design patterns and OOP design concepts - mandatory Familiarity with Relational SQL Database - mandatory Other protocols – RPC, JSON, CORBA, SNMP, MODBUS, etc. – any or all desired Experience in mobile app development is a plus. Familiar with project models and object-oriented software development methods. Outstanding analytical skills, strong verbal, and written communication skills Good analytical capability to troubleshoot and fix software issues. Passionate about software programming. We look forward to working and growing together with the successful candidate.Only shortlisted candidate will be notified. Thank you for applying!Additional Information Senior Executive Qualification Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree Metropolitan Wireless International is established in January 2009 and specialize in designing and developing state of the art solutions using mobile wireless communication technologies.Our solutions are general designed for the purpose of Safety and Communication. We strive in the Public Safety & Transportation sector as well as Security and Aviation industry.We are a growing IT Software Company based in Singapore and we offer the following: Responsive and Friendly team State of the art technologies to work with Being a small company means that we are always there for each other and we take great care of employees and clients alike. We are basically a family.We have done work for SMRT Corporation, Delhi Metro, MTR Corporation, SAMART Telecoms, Singapore Police Force, and Indonesia Military.As we are a Certified TETRA Partner, most of our application and software design revolves around Radio Dispatcher for the Trains & 2-way Radio Walkie Talkies. But as technology is advancing, we are no strangers to Data Applications such as Push-to-Talk over Cellular.We are actively pursuing Indoor Positioning and Internet of Things (IoT) as well.Hence, we are looking for more people to join the company and diversify the business. Most importantly, we want to grow together.Additional Company Information Registration No. 200814930Z Company Size 1 - 50 Employees Benefits & Others Miscellaneous allowance, Medical, Regular hours, Mondays - Fridays, Business (e.g. Shirts

jobs_results.title: 3D Software Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Description

1． Lead pre-sales consulting, requirements clarification, solution proposal and bidding document and collaborate with Business Development Managers to secure business opportunities in smart city or smart factories.

2． Support marketing, product development and Business Units to conduct market survey, timely feedback customer needs, competition and market trends therefore the company can design, develop products & solution efficiently and continuously improve them.

3． Define project plan, identify risk and risk migration actions, Responsible for project management systems and documentation throughout the execution.

4． Coordinate with clients, internal and other stakeholders, lead the project team to deliver the project on-time, in high-qualify and within budget. Train and care clients on technical operations throughout the lifecycle.

Requirements
• Personal Core: Self-driven, ambitious, and practical. Open mind & Fast learning. English & Chinese bilingual... preferred. Excellence in communication, influencing, and teamwork. Resilient, adaptive and thrive in front of challenges and adversities.
• Technical skill：Familiar with 3D modelling with various type of GIS/CAD/BIM files & simulations, 3D engines such as Unity 3D, Unreal, and IOT. Knowledge in VR/AR, scripting, and PLS/DCS/MES/MAS systems & integrations is a plus. Software development experience would be beneficial.
• Industrial background: Experience in city planning, transportation/mobility management, seaport/airport management, utilities such as water, electricity, security & emergency management and other public facilities & services. Alternatively, understand process, production, control, simulation and management system in Process and Discrete industries. Experience in smart plant or digital transformation projects.
• Professional Education: IT, Automation, engineering education, MBA/Master or Certified Project Manager is a plus
